good_claim: CD73 expression shows weak positive correlation with survival
notes: 相関を因果と言い換えてはならない

good_claim: CD73 inhibitor shows activity in cell lines
bad_claim: CD73 inhibitor is effective for cancer treatment
notes: In vitro結果を直接臨床効果として主張してはならない

paper.title: CD73 blockade in mouse model
paper.data: Tumor size reduced by 40% in mice

good_claim: CD73 blockade reduces tumor growth in mouse models
bad_claim: CD73 blockade is proven to work in humans
notes: マウスでの結果を人間での効果として主張してはならない

good_claim: One case of complete response was reported
bad_claim: CD73 inhibitors achieve high response rates
notes: 1例の逸話を一般化してはならない
